owner.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: He was now the proud owner of a bright red sports car.
Dog-owners have been warned to keep their animals under control.
I met the owner of the local hotel.
owner.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a person or organization that owns something
owner.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Legally, the buyer becomes the owner at the instant the contract is made.
The bank’s new fixed-rate mortgage is proving popular with home owners.
The publisher is the owner of the trademark ‘Oxford’.
owner.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: if something is bought or taken somewhere at the owner’s risk, the owner, not the person selling it or taking it, is responsible if it is damaged or lost
owner.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: Luggage is carried at the owner’s risk.
